name: build that bagel
description:
I made this game in like two days but it's actually pretty great lol

click the play button to start, click beans to pick them up and click them on the bagel. after clicking "eat the bagel" you click the bagel to pick it up. The broom erases all beans, the trash can erases any beans you are currently holding. Clicking the lightbulb toggles the dim/flicker effect. 

Feel free to post your creations in the comments! I like to draw characters using beans
